author: My Camera World
content:
Andreas:

I am glad to see you join the SofoBoMo book project and hope you find the theme that works for you. This is the first year that this project has started thanks to Paul Butzi and I think its important at least for us as artists that we contribute to the project.

I decide to start later as I needed more warm weather for the foliage to start to grow as I wanted to capture some of the landscape and nature around me.

I wasnâ€™t sure of the project theme, but did select one. I have now decided to augment this theme, as it was not easy to get more images from the first location on time.

Niels
